Reviews.Title: I love this phone because:)
Reviews.Author: M. E. Quillin "Mamaria"
Reviews.Content: My service plan is with Consumer Cellular (I've been with them for several years and like their service) and I haven't had any problems with this phone

ProductInfo.Features:
Factory Unlocked, and Quad band to work with all GSM carriers including T-Mobile, AT&T;, Simple Mobile, GoSmart, and others worldwide
3.2 Megapixel Camera; Take high-quality pictures from your phone that you can enlarge or print.
3G Capable; Quickly connect to the Internet via 3G anywhere within the T-Mobile USA 3G network.
Android 4.1 Jellybean; Google's latest version of the Android OS including Google Now and "Butter" performance improvements.
Included in box: T-Mobile Prism II Phone, Battery & Charger, Start Guide, Terms & Conditions
ProductInfo.Name: New Factory Unlocked Huawei U8686, T-Mobile Prism II, Black, International GSM Android Phone, Unlocked to work with AT&T, T-Mobile, all GSM Network worldwide
